ai.agents

Class CornerAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • ai.agents.CornerAgent

  • public class CornerAgent
extends java.lang.Object
    Calculates the advantage of occupying the corner, by taking into account what the surrounding fields, their dice index is, and connected edges.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CornerAgent(int[] loc, Board board, AdvancedAI aai)
      Instantiates a new corner agent.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void calculateInitialRoad()
      Used to calculate the best direction for the initial roads, by checking the corners on the adjacent edges of the adjacent edges to this corner.
      int calculateInitialVillageUtility()
      Adds all the factors together to calculate the utility for placing the initial settlement, the higher the utility, the higher the chance to be picked by the AI as a spot to build on.
      int[] getBestRoad()
      Returns the coordinates of the highest utility road.
      Field[] getFields()
      Gets the fields.
      java.lang.String getID()
      Gets the id.
      int[] getLocation()
      Gets the location.
      java.lang.String getLocationString()
      Gets the location string.
      protected int harbourDiversity()
      Returns a utility number depending on the type of harbour surrounds the corner; 2to1 harbours preferred over 3to1 harbours.
      protected boolean isBlocked()
      Returns false if the corner can be build upon, otherwise true and blocked.
      protected int landDiversity()
      Returns a utility number depending on the difference of the surrounding fields; and their type.
      protected int resourceBonus()
      Calculates whether there is an ore/corn bonus.
      protected int rollProbability()
      Adds or deducts utility depending on the probability to roll the number set on the field.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • calculateInitialRoad

        public void calculateInitialRoad()
        Used to calculate the best direction for the initial roads, by checking the corners on the adjacent edges of the adjacent edges to this corner.

      • getBestRoad

        public int[] getBestRoad()
        Returns the coordinates of the highest utility road.
        Returns:
        the best road

      • calculateInitialVillageUtility

        public int calculateInitialVillageUtility()
        Adds all the factors together to calculate the utility for placing the initial settlement, the higher the utility, the higher the chance to be picked by the AI as a spot to build on.
        Returns:
        the int

      • isBlocked

        protected boolean isBlocked()
        Returns false if the corner can be build upon, otherwise true and blocked. Blocked corners aren't taken into account.
        Returns:
        true, if is blocked

      • landDiversity

        protected int landDiversity()
        Returns a utility number depending on the difference of the surrounding fields; and their type. Difference since we want to prioritize fields that have different types over fields that have the same type, and then since sea and desert fields are not benefitial they deduct value
        Returns:
        the int

      • harbourDiversity

        protected int harbourDiversity()
        Returns a utility number depending on the type of harbour surrounds the corner; 2to1 harbours preferred over 3to1 harbours.
        Returns:
        the int

      • rollProbability

        protected int rollProbability()
        Adds or deducts utility depending on the probability to roll the number set on the field.
        Returns:
        the int

      • resourceBonus

        protected int resourceBonus()
        Calculates whether there is an ore/corn bonus.
        Returns:
        the int
